1370: Berta was born in Die lange straet1 in 1370.
Got married to Herman at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Sybillia in 1371 at age 19.

1377: Gave birth to Engelbertus in 1377 at age 25.
1378: Gave birth to Cofte in 1378 at age 26.
1385: Gave birth to Gobel in 1385 at age 33.
1386: Gave birth to Truden in 1386 at age 34.
1387: Lost son Lardies when Lardies was 12 years old.
